Detailed Description

A wrapper class for IOPacket.

IOPacketWrapper serves as a siple wrapper for an IOPacket adding functionality which creates a buffer for the IOPacket::m_values buffer on construction and frees the buffer on destruction.

Definition at line 100 of file interface.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

IOPacketWrapper::IOPacketWrapper (  const unsigned int  p_nValues  )  [inline]
 

Constructor, allocates buffer.

Creates a buffer of p_nValues entries of type double and assigns it to IOPacket::m_values.

Parameters:
p_nValues The number of values the m_values buffer will support, abuffer will be created of this size.
